txt.en: 'Have you heard about the many animals that have been put on display in the menagerie of the Upper Ward? A man called Ezôti has gathered a number of fearsome creatures; just thinking about them fills me with dread!\n\n'He is to be found by Bith Gabâr in the Upper Ward. When I am done with my work I will go there right away!'
Talk to Ezôti by Bith Gabâr in the Upper Ward
'Another interested set of eyes? Indeed, indeed! Rumour of my creatures has spread far and wide, but none so far as that concerning my latest acquisition!'
A man named Ezôti has assembled a fearsome collection of animals for his menagerie in the Upper Ward, and it is the talk of many folk in the Sail-haven.
You know that Ezôti's 'show' is no longer happening, and his animals have been freed
Talk to Ezôti by Bith Gabâr in the Upper Ward
Ezôti can be found by Bith Gabâr in the Upper Ward.

'Have you heard about the many animals that have been put on display in the menagerie of the Upper Ward? A man called Ezôti has gathered a number of fearsome creatures; just thinking about them fills me with dread!\n\n'He is to be found by Bith Gabâr in the Upper Ward. When I am done with my work I will go there right away!'
